title: Track Equipment Utilization
description: A manager wants to know if they have enough straddle carriers or if they need to purchase more. An analyst must assess utilization.

tasks.description: Retrieve operational data for the straddle carrier fleet over the last 3 months, including operating hours and downtime.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst pulls a complete dataset of equipment usage.

tasks.description: Calculate the average utilization rate for the fleet (Operating Hours / (Total Hours - Downtime Hours)).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst calculates an average utilization rate of 88%.

tasks.description: Generate a report concluding that the high utilization rate indicates a need for additional equipment to handle peak demand.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is created with a clear recommendation based on the data.
